query_1.text: Who was Abraham Lincoln and what significant roles did he play in American history?

query_2.text: What were the major accomplishments of Abraham Lincoln during his presidency?

query_3.text: When did Abraham Lincoln serve as the 16th President of the United States?

query_4.text: Where was Abraham Lincoln born, and what influence did his early life have on his political career?

query_5.text: Why is Abraham Lincoln often regarded as one of the greatest presidents in American history?

query_6.text: How did Abraham Lincoln's leadership style contribute to his effectiveness in navigating the challenges of the Civil War?
